body.name: Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus – enhanced wifi, improved motion detection, 4-second video previews, easy installation
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 4 hrs 2 mins
features: A Certified Refurbished Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus is refurbished, tested, and certified to look and work like new and comes with the same limited warranty as a new device.
1080p HD video doorbell with enhanced features that let you see, hear, and speak to anyone from your phone, tablet, or PC.
An upgrade from the original Ring Video Doorbell 2, enjoy improved motion detection, privacy zones and audio privacy, and dual-band (2.4 or 5.0 GHz) wifi connectivity.
Exclusive to Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus, get 4 extra seconds of black and white video to show you what happened before motion was triggered with Pre-Roll.
Receive mobile notifications when anyone presses your doorbell or triggers your built-in motion sensors.
Easily setup by connecting your Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus to wifi through the Ring app and mounting with the included tools.
With a Ring Protect Plan (subscription sold separately), record all your videos, review what you missed for up to 60 days, and share videos and photos.
Pair with select Alexa-enabled devices to enable announcements and two-way talk for convenient in-home monitoring.

productInformation.name: Video
productInformation.value: 1080p HD Video, Live View, Night Vision Video quality for Pre-Roll feature is less than 1080p. Night vision is not included with Pre-Roll

productInformation.name: Motion detection
productInformation.value: Advanced Motion Detection with customizable motion zones

productInformation.name: Audio
productInformation.value: Two-way audio with noise cancellation Pre-Roll does not include audio

productInformation.name: Power
productInformation.value: Runs on a rechargeable quick-release battery pack (included). Can be hardwired to an existing doorbell system or transformer for continuous charging (8-24 VAC, 40 VA max, 50/60 Hz).

productInformation.name: Connectivity
productInformation.value: 802.11 b/g/n wifi connection @ 2.4 GHz and 5.0 GHz

productInformation.name: Dimensions
productInformation.value: 5.1 in. x 2.4 in. x 1.1 in. (128 mm x 62 mm x 28 mm)

productInformation.name: Box includes
productInformation.value: Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus, rechargeable battery pack, corner mount, USB charging cable, mounting bracket, installation tools and hardware, user manual, and security sticker. Ships with a Satin Nickel faceplate.

productInformation.name: Setup requirements
productInformation.value: Only if wiring in: Standard doorbell system with 8-24 VAC, 40 VA max, 50/60 Hz doorbell transformer

productInformation.name: Warranty and service
productInformation.value: 1-year limited warranty. This device receives the same limited warranty as a new device. Learn more about Certified Refurbished Amazon devices.. Use of Ring Video Doorbell 3 Plus is subject to the terms found here.

productInformation.name: Support
productInformation.value: Click here to view more information on the Ring Video Doorbell support page.

productInformation.name: Software Security Updates
productInformation.value: This device receives guaranteed software security updates until at least four years after the device is last available for purchase as a new unit on our websites. Learn more about these software security updates. If you already own a Ring device, visit Software Security Updates in Ring Control Center for information specific to your device.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love the product. It was really easy to setup. I feel safe before opening my door to strangers. I would buy this product again. It is refurbished as it works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Refurbished is the way to go!
reviews.reviewText: I just received my Ring Door yesterday, it takes about 12 hours for the battery to charge. I installed it today, super easy! Just follow the prompts on the Ring App. I don’t have a hard wired doorbell, so we’ll see how long before I have to remove the battery to recharge it. So far the picture is clear, I won’t know until tonight what the night vision is like. I’m pleased with my purchase of this refurbished Ring Door!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
Reviewed in the United States on December 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not all the parts included, connectivity is a challenge
reviews.reviewText: I bought this as a second doorbell for my house. It looked new, but when I looked for the security screws for the cover, they did not exist. They actually charge you to get replacements for these tiny little things! Not cool. The other issue is connectivity. Hardwiring is not an option for me, and I have a midcentury bungalow with heavy plaster walls. Despite the chime and internet expanders, it is hit or miss with the connection. I purchased the second ring to replace an inexpensive video doorbell that did not last even 6 months.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I was skeptical about purchasing a refurbished camera but figured why not save some money where we can worse case scenario we would just return it. Luckily though we have had zero issues with this refurbished camera it works great, we were very close to getting a regular ring 3 just because it’s much cheaper until I came across these refurbished ones. We have had the camera for a couple of months now and no issues what so ever I can 100% say it works just as good as a brand new one would.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Es un buen producto me a gustado mucho
reviews.reviewText: Tengo una pregunta se me a descargado la bateria y he perdido el destornillador para sacar la bateria alguien me puede decir que medida es y donde lo puedo conseguir gracias

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great product fast delivery

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 24, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the investment!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. *Originally bought September 2021*Wanted to wait to leave a review until we had it for a while and saw how it worked through winter.It only disconnected once and it was due to an ice storm - real thick layer of ice, that’s only issue. It’s worked just fine, we recently got the solar panel attachment for it! The clarity on videos are clear both for night and day. The motion activity for it is set up in the settings, there are a few different areas that you can control the sensitivity and the area or zone of the activity. You just gotta mess around in the settings.Due to only being able to add one video I included one that was at night time and a pic from the day time
